rukus.text: Wa Qala Al-Maliku A'tuni Bihi Falamma Ja'ahu Ar-Rasulu Qala Arji` 'Ila Rabbika Fas'alhu Ma Balu An-Niswati Al-Lati Qatta`na 'Aydiyahunna 'Inna Rabbi Bikaydihinna `Alimun

Qala Ma Khatbukunna 'Idh Rawadttunna Yusufa `An Nafsihi Qulna Hasha Lillahi Ma `Alimna `Alayhi Min Su'in Qalati Amra'atu Al-`Azizi Al-'Ana Hashasa Al-Haqqu 'Ana Rawadttuhu `An Nafsihi Wa 'Innahu Lamina As-Sadiqina
Dhalika Liya`lama 'Anni Lam 'Akhunhu Bil-Ghaybi Wa 'Anna Allaha La Yahdi Kayda Al-Kha'inina
Wa Ma 'Ubarri'u Nafsi 'Inna An-Nafsa La'ammaratun Bis-Su'i 'Illa Ma Rahima Rabbi 'Inna Rabbi Ghafurun Rahimun
Wa Qala Al-Maliku A'tuni Bihi 'Astakhlishu Linafsi Falamma Kallamahu Qala 'Innaka Al-Yawma Ladayna Makinun 'Aminun
Wa Kadhalika Makkanna Liyusufa Fi Al-'Arđi Yatabawwa'u Minha Haythu Yasha'u Nusibu Birahmatina Man Nasha'u Wa La Nuđi`u 'Ajra Al-Muhsinina
Wa La'ajru Al-'Akhirati Khayrun Lilladhina 'Amanu Wa Kanu Yattaquna
